metadata.synopsis: When entering the outfit room in the grotto, shadowheart will briefly expand on its purpose.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Enter the outfit room

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: A cunning disguise can serve a warrior of the Dark Lady better than any armour. That's what they always told us.
0.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful. Memory stirred by a room full of costumes and disguises. Arc - abandoned shar.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: I think this was my favourite part - putting these on, pretending to be someone else. I suppose that's been my whole life.
3.context: NodeContext: Fond half-remembered memories, hitting a sour note at the end. Arc - abandoned shar.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: All these disguises... we were taught that Lady Shar's warriors had to be able to hide in plain sight, wherever we went...
2.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful. Memory stirred by a room full of costumes and disguises. Arc - loyal to shar

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I think this was my favourite part - losing myself in here. Being someone else, even just for a while.
1.context: NodeContext: Fond half-remembered memories. Arc - loyal to shar
